p:
The duration of an aphid colony on a plant is very likely to affect the number of ladybirds that complete their development. This is predicted by theoretical models
11, 13, 23, 25 and is also recorded in field data, as the incidence of cannibalism and death due to starvation increases during the fourth instar, i.e., towards the end of the existence of an aphid colony
9, 26 . Thus, when looking for a reason for the paucity of H. axyridis in the Mediterranean, we considered duration of aphid colonies as one possible candidate.
